channel.title: Skill Shields v2
channel.description:
ok so someone said i should make the shields with the real skill cape colours so i did but i also changed the shield shape and the icon alittle im alittle more happy with it now but it looks alittle simple.. enjoy :)
[size=18pt]Slayer[/size]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/slayerv2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/slayerv2wire.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/slayerv2side.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/slayerv2t.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Runecrafting[/size]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/rcv2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/rcv2wire2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/rcv2wire.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/rsshieldv2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Skill Shields v2
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Loveandpower:

This is different I actually like it. Are you planing on releasing after your satisfied with it?

No, I’m sorry. I won’t be releasing the model because i do not believe its a good model.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:28, topic:379624”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475460.msg3479161#msg3479161 date=1295953998]

next you should do rune-swords like fire rune sword and chaos rune sword etc, i always thought that would be cool in rs.

element swords? like have the rune on the hilt and the colour of the element as the blade and all that?
[/quote]
Could work as Dylan created those sexy elemental bows a while back. Might be able to make something fit into that theme.[/quote]
I made the elemental sword, no one liked it.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Shields v2
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:14, topic:379624”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475460.msg3477796#msg3477796 date=1295834241]

there to basic right now? the skillcape’s are nice because of there shoulder parts, else it would just be a empty cape with a skill picture on it, add something on your shields,
and no spikes plz;)

I do really like this!

i was thinking about making spikes to basicly look like its holding the skill part on (outer layer) but then i thought it’d look stupid so i didnt… so yer i dwnt be adding spikes lol
[/quote]
Idea is good. Concept is shit. Draw up a more elaborate shield. As this is your prize for getting lvl 120 in a skill. I had an idea like this once. Just it was capes instead of shields.[/quote]
any idea of what kinda shape shield you’d like? because my shied ideas have run dry atm… still thinking about another model but it might take awhile

Read full topic
